mainSequence.step: Admin requests to view list of settings
List settings view sends request to SettingsController
SettingsController retrieves list of settings from SettingsModel
SettingsModel returns list of settings to SettingsController
SettingsController sends list of settings to list settings view
List settings view displays the list of settings to Admin
List settings view sends newly edited settings data to SettingsController
SettingsController saves the edited settings to SettingsModel
SettingsModel returns save result to SettingsController
SettingsController sends updated list of settings to list settings view
List settings view displays updated list of settings to Admin
